de.hu.berlin.wbi.objects

Class Gene

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.hu.berlin.wbi.objects.Gene

  • public class Gene
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a gene mention found by any Named Enttiy Recognition and Normalization tool. In this work we always used GNAT and gene2pubmed
